docs.summary:
The wix-billing-backend module contains functionality for working with
 billing features, such as [price quotes](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-price-quotes-creating-and-sending-price-quotes-to-clients) and
[invoices](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-wix-invoices).
description: A site owner can send an invoice or a price quote to customers using the Billing APIs.
With the Billings APIs, you can:
- Handle site user events related to price quotes and invoices.
To use the Billing API, import `wixBillingBackend` from the `wix-billing-backend` module:

docs.summary:
The wix-billing-backend module contains functionality for working with
 [your site's invoices](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-wix-invoices)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Invoices API, import `{invoices}` from the `wix-billing-backend` module:

docs.summary:
The wix-billing-backend module contains functionality for working with
 your site's [price quotes](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-price-quotes-creating-and-sending-price-quotes-to-clients)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Price Quotes API, import `{priceQuotes}` from the `wix-billing-backend` module:
